What are the key considerations when selecting climate-resilient seeds?
output: Local Adaptation: Choose varieties suited to your specific regional climate.
Drought Resistance: Opt for seeds with high water efficiency in dry areas.
Flood Resistance: Select water-tolerant varieties for flood-prone regions.
Heat Tolerance: Grow crops bred to withstand extreme temperatures.
Cold Hardiness: Pick frost-resistant varieties for cold environments.
Soil Suitability: Ensure crops are adapted to saline or acidic soils if necessary.
